subject  re  pre  submitted question on espeak erin  a book by martha amram and nalin kulatilaka is an excellent non  technical introduction to real option and it contains all the most important reference to more advanced book and paper  the book ha an endorsement by jeff skilling on the cover page  the research group offered several one  day seminar on real option and application to the energy industry  we still have a few binder with the presentation material available if you are interested  we plan to repeat the seminar sometimes in the fall  the first part of the seminar  about  hour in the morning  cover general concept of real option and their applicability to the energy business  the second  more technical afternoon session  cover stochastic process used to model price uncertainty in the energy market and specific case study  valuation of natural gas storage facility and of peaking gas  fired power plant   the real option approach ha been developed specifically to address the problem of making investment decision under uncertainty  nobody in this field claim that this is a perfect tool  but it represents a significant progress compared to other technique developed earlier  discounted cash flow analysis that try to incorporate uncertainty through analysis of several  in most case  arbitrary scenario  most likely  optimistic  pessimistic   these scenario don  t identify explicitly the risk driver and don  t specify the future proactive management decision  the real  option approach is very powerful because it allows to    capture uncertainty in an explicit way and    to design investment project that allow to exploit future positive development and reduce future exposure to downside risk  this approach allows also create a link between investment decision and future operational decision  forward  looking investment decision create option that are exercised in the future through active management of a project  the real option technology relies heavily on advanced statistical tool to come up with the representation of future possible state of the world  the real challenge is to use these tool in a sensible way  i have seen in my career  almost  year of applying mathematical tool to business and economic problem  many quants armed with powerful computer who reminded me of monkey armed with hammer  the challenge is not to run mechanically thousand of simulation based on arbitrary assumption but to translate in a creative way the insight of people who understand specific business into parsimonious quantitative model  it is especially critical to stress  test the assumption of any model and to ask the question if the outcome of a model depends critically on any set of assumption  if this is the case one should use common sense to examine the underlying assumption  i remember that in the early eighty quite a few model simulated the dynamic of oil price  but all the stochastic scenario represented fluctuation around a very optimistic upward trend  one would have been better off stepping back and asking a simple question what economics  teach about cartel and the dynamic of supply and demand  enron north america corp  from  erin rice  enron         pm to  vince j kaminski  hou  ect  ect cc  subject  pre  submitted question on espeak good news  there is already a question waiting for your july  espeak session  i have pasted it below  although you don  t have to respond until the actual event  don  t forget to send a bulleted list of discussion topic if you would still like u to advertise the event on the elevator screen  thanks   er submitted by breineck i wa doing some reading about the application of real option in the evaluation of non  financial asset  would you recommend any text or article for a more in  depth study of this area  is quantification of risk or uncertainty the major challenge in using this concept  can statistical tool be used with this to do a sort of sensitivity analysis

subject  siam invitation dear dr  kaminski here is an email invitation for teh siam event  a hard copy will follow dr  v  kaminski enron p  o  box  houston  texas    dear dr  kaminski march    i am writing to formalize your invitation to attend  participate  and speak in the siam southwest regional mathematics in industry workshop  a time span of thirty minute is being allotted to invited talk with an additional ten minute or so for discussion  the workshop  funded under the auspex of a national science foundation grant to siam will not be a standard applied mathematics event with representative from industry  academe  and governmental agency presenting their latest research result  instead the meeting will emphasize the mathematics and technology currently applied to the project of industry and governmental laboratory  additionally the event will focus upon the mechanism facilitating interaction and collaboration between the academy  industry  and government laboratory  the workshop will be held at the university of houston hilton hotel  april     fund will be available to support both travel expense and the cost of food and lodging of invited speaker  we will be happy to make travel arrangement on this end if so desired  we hope that you can accept our invitation  if this is the case please furnish u with a title  a short abstract  and a list of the necessary equipment for your presentation  we look forward to seeing you at the university of houston  sincerely w  fitzgibbon

talking to enron  one is a a financial economist  the other a the director of the newly formed  global mobility innovation initiative  gmii    this is the research project funded by lucent  involving bu  lb  and insead  to study various aspect of the mobile internet  read  g   on the former i am working with a couple of ph  d  student in understanding  a  detail of how having physical supply  inventory  can be used by a market maker  this is a problem that ha been study in the context of specialist inventory in the stock market but i think really interesting in the way enron doe it in some of the newer market like bandwidth  i think this is a big issue in lighting up all the dark fiber that is in the ground   b  how enron is disciplining the internal decision making process with market  this is in many way the critical aspect of real option that most finance people miss   having option is one thing but exercising them and realizing their value is another  all of the incomplete contracting  asymmetric information  and incentive issue are ignored in real option valuation model  but they are real in practice  my impression is enron  s real success is in putting place an organization that is able to mitigate these problem by imposing a market disciplining   c  how enron manages the various book that involve physicals  financials  credit etc  this is specially important when many of the real asset have option feature and therefore  include non  linear risk profile  the story of gas is pretty well understood but not many of the others market enron ha been moving into over the last few year  on the gmii front  i think that some interesting opportunity arise when you think of the spectrum in a way similar to that of dark fiber  i am working with several people at lucent on this issue  i think it would be wonderful to engage in a conversation with enron and lucent folk in the room  i can do a lunch time talk on any of these issue  perhaps we can subject  re  var let  s meet at     vince j kaminski         am to  john arnold  hou  ect  ect cc  vince j kaminski  hou  ect  ect  tanya tamarchenko  hou  ect  ect  jim schwieger  hou  ect  ect  jeffrey a shankman  hou  ect  ect subject  var john  we have been working for the last few day on var related issue  the focus is on jim schwieger  s storage book a of    and    where we had some counterintuitive result  this book is a good candidate for a systematic review of the var process  it seems that the problem arises from forward  forward vols used by the var system  you can see in the attached spreadsheet that the var  on a cumulative basis  jump on jan   when an abnormal ff vol hit a relatively large position  this ff vol is also much different from the previous day number producing a big jump in var  this row  jan   is in magenta font in the attached spreadsheet  please  look at column d  the abnormal ff vol may result from one of the two factor  a  a bug in the code  we are working with the person in it who wrote the code to review it  b  a poorly conditioned forward vol curve  a kink or discontinuity in the fwd vol curve will do it   one solution i can propose  is to develop for the trader a fwd  fwd vol generator allowing them to review the fwd vol curve before it is posted  if it produce a weird fwd  fwd vol  it can be smoothed  can you meet at  p  m  to review our finding  vince

simon blakey  cera director  mack brother  cera director date   march  re  introduction of the european gas advisory service and european power advisory service for the past  year  cera  s european gas and power retainer advisory service ha been primarily a natural gas service  with a small component related to electric power issue  in recognition of the changing industry and regulatory environment for electric power  we have significantly added to our electric power capability in europe over the past three year  in term of both staff and of the depth and breadth of our research  based on strong client demand for a dedicated team and service focused on the impending sea change for the power industry and our desire not to lessen the service we provide to the natural gas industry and market in europe  cera is pleased to announce the launch of the european power advisory service a of  april   this new service  in combination with our existing european gas advisory service  will maintain cera  s thought leadership and provide client with an  early warning  system in these fast changing and important market  the two team will continue to work closely together  which will allow them to identify and analyze the important aspect of  convergence  between the gas and electric power market while highlighting and researching the independent issue in each market  european gas advisory service the european gas advisory service will continue to provide client with independent analysis and insight on the changing dynamic of the european gas market  it offer decision maker clear and comprehensive analysis on the future energy landscape and the challenge posed by the emerging competitive environment in europe  the focus is on market fundamental  the impact of european union and national policy  the changing industry structure  and strategic response  the deliverable include  the semi  annual european gas watch european gas decision brief european gas private report european gas energy signpost interactive medium conference call dedicated european gas website  highlighting cera  s current thinking and market fundamental on the gas sector in europe on a country  by  country basis  attendance at european gas roundtable  optional  european power advisory service the european power advisory service will provide client with independent analysis and insight on the changing dynamic of the european power market  the service will review the market fundamental for the european electricity market and will provide client with a framework for understanding and interpreting the major change taking place in the market  european power advisory service will present cera  s view of the dynamic and assessment of the opportunity being created in the market  the deliverable will include  a semi  annual european power watch european power decision brief european power private report european power energy signpost interactive medium conference call dedicated european power website  highlighting cera  s current thinking and market fundamental on the power sector in europe on a country  by  country basis  attendance at european power roundtable  optional  we are pleased at this opportunity to enhance cera  s coverage of a rapidly changing market and look forward to providing you with deeper and broader perspective on the future of european energy  if you have any question regarding this exciting transition  please contact mack brother  in our paris office at            also please note the upcoming european gas and european power roundtable session scheduled for monday  june  in paris  these roundtable commence at  a  m  and include dinner that evening   cera is pleased to announce that a of  april  mack brother will be moving from our cambridge office to our paris office to head the commercial team for european energy    end   this electronic message and attachment  if any  contain information from cambridge energy subject  option hedging for ee eugene  bob and i had a discussion about your question you raised yesterday  for an option writer  he ha the obligation to deliver  so he hedge it with the underlying by adjesting delta position  the hedging cost  theoretically  should be equal to the fair value of the option premium  on the other hand  for the option holder  he ha no obligation  by delta heging  he would pay double for the option  with no upside  so he should not hedge it at all  if the option holder want to protect the time value of the option  he should sell the option to the market or some equivalent option to create a theta  neutral portfolio  this may require trading in both the orginal and the equivalent option underlyings  our question to you  if the call option you mentioned are embedded in the ee contract  say fixed price sale contract  what make it possible to just separate those option and sell them to the market to retain the full value of the option  we conjecture that these option are meant to hedge the original contract  by selling those option you eliminate the upside of the original contract  give one of u a call if you want to discus this further  zimin

subject  gaming of neta price  constraint on the mccoy strategy fyi  bm  balancing market in his email   i  m still on eklavya  s back to produce a white paper analysis of possible trading stretagies under neta and their likely implication for price and volatility  i  ll forward it on a soon a  if ever  i receive it  steve                       forwarded by steven leppard  lon  ect on         pm                            eklavya sareen         to  ect london uk power trading  enron london power analytics  ect london uk gas and power origination  paul dawson  lon  ect  ect cc  subject  gaming of neta price  constraint on the mccoy strategy i believe most people are now familiar with the mccoy strategy for manipulating imbalance price in a favourable direction    take a massive long or short position in forward trading   choose physical production decision to drive system i  long if forward market postion is long ii  short if forward market postion is short   if system is long it need to accept bid  if system is short it need to accept offer   if forward market postion is long submit very large postive bid to the bm to drive ssp high  ssp is price received for spilling power to the bm  going into bm long    if forward market postion is short submit very small  even negative  offer to the bm to drive sbp low  sbp is price paid for purchasing power from bm  going into bm short  the neta programme intends to tag transmission cosntraint related trade in the bm  according to disg   tagging constraint trade    dec   option   a   the option that is proposed to be adopted   paragraph     p      in the relevant settlement period  all accepted offer and bid volume that can be arbitraged  i  e  where a volume ha been bid higher than the price at which a volume ha been offered  are eliminated   one of the implication of the above procedure is that the highest bid  the mccoy bid  and the lowest offer  the mccoy offer  are likely to be eliminated from the calculation   this would be an effective way of introducing you to many more people in  eb  including many of the trader  the topic could be of your choice and  could be related to network or the future of the subject  re  eol pricing algorithm hi bob  some comment    you request enron position after successful market order  but not after limit order   you may want it after limit order a well to be consistent  i am not clear on how you would use enron position  it is possible that the trading desk will have a target position in mind and they will set bid and offer in such a way a to try to achieve that target position  but this target position probably change continuously and is not stored anywhere  and without this target position there is nothing to compare actual enron position to  of course  enron position may still provide some insight    you request bid  mid  ask price for each trade    given that a successful trade may execute later than time of order  especially for limit order   would you need the evolution or range of bid  mid  ask over this time interval  time of order to time of execution   also  for failed trade  you may need the evolution or range of bid  mid  ask over the time interval from time of order to time of rejection  this again mainly applies to limit order  a the time interval may not be significant for market order given the speed of execution  something to check        original message      from  lee  bob sent  monday  april       am to  kaminski  vince  shanbhogue  vasant  barkley  tom cc  lu  zimin  huang  alex  gibner  stinson subject  eol pricing algorithm a draft data request for eol data we would use to study p  l pattern for the  george  pricing algorithm is attached for your review  i would like to send this to andy zipper and jay webb this afternoon  bob

subject  template for pricing the right of first refusal shelley and chris  i have set up a template for pricing rofrs  the rofr is priced a a series forward start option  a forward start option give the holder the right to exercise the option but the strike price is set at the money in future before the option expiration  the feature mimic the  matching the best bid  in the rofr  the underlying for the option is the  best bid   which should be closely related to the price differential between the two hub that the pipeline connects  therefore the rofr is case dependent  a vince pointed out  the volatility can be estimated from the  best bid  price history  with these input we can estimate the value of rofr  if you have any question concerning the model please feel free to call me or vince  zimin lu

subject  alp proposal carrie  i am sending you  a promised  the draft of my proposal  please  let me know if it meet your requirement  i shall be glad to revise it and send you the final version  vince kaminski           one of the most important trend in the energy industry during the last year wa proliferation of electronic  internet based  trading platform for wholesale market and for retail operation  website such a www  houstonstreet  com and www  altranet  com provide facility for matching buyer and seller  the website operated by enron corp   enrononline  represents an alternative solution under which enron act a a principal in every transaction  on the retail  side  many retail e  commerce company offering auction  reverse auction and platform for creation of buyer   club challenge incumbent utility  the objective of this project is to evaluate the impact of e  commerce  both at the wholesale and retail level  on the energy industry  the study will start with comparative analysis of different wholesale trading and retail e  commerce business model and evaluation of their long  term viability  the next step will be assessment of the impact of e  commerce on price dynamic  profit margin and the level of competition in different energy market  a separate section will be devoted to analysis of reaction of company and organization affected by e  commerce  incumbent utility  organized exchange  energy broker  to the new competitive threat  and different strategy they implement to meet the challenge  organized exchange have accelerated in many case the transition to screen  based trading that ha been already replacing open outcry technology  power and natural gas marketer have created alliance  with other industry player  software company and electronic exchange  to create their own trading platform  gas and electric utility embarked on development of vertical and horizontal e  commerce platform  offering service to household and other company in the energy industry  the critical question is how quickly different company should react to the competitive threat and how fast they should exploit opportunity created by the internet based economy  it  s quite obvious that the internet revolution will change the energy industry  s landscape during the next few year  the objective of the project is to provide answer to the question posed above  based on the currently available information  additionally  the participant should come up with fallback strategy the energy company should implement in case the currently  expected trend fail to materialize   _

subject  update  reimbursement of individually billed item the use of cell phone and pager ha increased dramatically in the past few year  a a result the account payable department ha seen a rapid increase in the number of invoice and vendor  with the higher volume  we have reviewed our process in order to continue our rapid payment cycle  although we encourage vendor to address their invoice to individual employee  they often mail invoice directly to account payable  at time they fail to list the individual who us the pager or cell phone  in these case we return the invoice to the vendor  if the employee is designated  we try to track him  her down and forward the invoice  the high level of employee movement among job and location at enron ha made this increasingly challenging  either way  we end up doing something le productive than paying invoice  to maintain satisfactory response to our vendor and to reduce time necessary for research  we request that employee who have pager  cell phone  and other individually billed item such a license  subscription  etc   pay for them by personal check or charge card  if applicable   payment instruction are usually indicated on the invoice  and request reimbursement through employee expense report  by submitting these charge on your expense report  you can help u reduce the amount of time spent researching and forwarding invoice  the number of check generated by treasury  the number of vendor in our database  and the turnaround time for payment of invoice  incidentally  account payable is currently installing a corporate  wide web  based expense reporting system similar to what enron international ha used for the past year  this will make it even easier to file your expense report and receive quick reimbursement  we   d like to make this effective immediately  if you have any question or suggestion  please contact the account payable department

subject  organizational change enron is forming a new organization   the enron xcelerator   to drive the formation and development of new business at enron  enron  s unique ability to start and develop new business ha driven most of our growth over the year  lou l  pai  currently chairman and ceo of enron energy service  will lead the xcelerator  over his year at enron  lou ha been key to the creation and rapid growth of our wholesale gas  wholesale power and energy service business  the existing business unit will continue their development of core business  while the xcelerator will be responsible for developing new business opportunity that are natural extension of enron  s business model and core skill  but not currently under development elsewhere in enron  dave delainey  currently president and ceo of enron america  will become chairman and ceo of enron energy service  dave brings a wealth of experience and accomplishment from enron wholesale service  business where he led the growth of our canadian business and our north american origination activity and  most recently  had a great year in enron america  dave is forming an office of the chairman in ee  joining dave in the office of the chairman are dan leff  president of ee  global energy service  and marty sunde  president of ee  global marketing and service  dan and marty have been instrumental in the development and execution of the successful ee business model  also joining the office of the chairman of ee is janet dietrich a chief operating officer  janet  currently is managing director in enron america  where she ha been successful in many of enron wholesale  s core business  including gas trading  risk management and structural origination  tom white will continue a vice chairman of ee and will focus on the development and expansion of ee  customer relationship  lou  tom  dan  marty and the entire ee organization have developed a great business model with great growth prospect  ee ha become an essential part of enron  s market valuation and growth story  this new leadership structure will enable ee to continue on it path of sustained growth and increasing profitability  john lavorato will succeed dave a president and ceo of enron america  john ha been an essential part of enron  s energy trading success over the year and is a key part of enron wholesale service  continuing success story  joining john is louise kitchen  currently president and ceo of enron network  louise  who accelerated enron  s outstanding growth with the deployment of enrononline  will take over a chief operating officer of enron america  philippe bibi  currently chief operating officer of enron network will take over a president and ceo of enron network  under philippe  s leadership  enron ha become a technology leader and the leading e  commerce company  joining philippe a chief operating officer is greg piper  currently managing director of enron network  greg currently lead enron network  s origination activity and wa responsible for the creation and deployment of clickpaper  enron  s successful online pulp and paper marketplace  please join u in congratulating all of these individual on their achievement and their new responsibility

subject  re  var vince thanks for the update  especially your point  which echo our own discussion yesterday  i want to clarify responsibility for maintenance and administration of var  we need transparency around the process so that mapping decision  for example  are easily made  supported and reviewed  it became clear after last friday  s event  that we are in an awkward paradigm with respect to how we handle var here  particularly at  pressure point   i am putting together the scope of a  general overhaul  of the var process  including method and administration  to which i hope we would all buy in  so be assured of our co  operation  dp      original message      from  kaminski  vince sent  wednesday  april       pm to  port  david cc  lavorato  john  kaminski  vince  tamarchenko  tanya subject  var david  during today  s var coordination meeting we had a discussion of issue related to mapping of the forward price curve into core location  mapping is a necessity dictated by the limitation of the computer system  we have to reduce the dimensionality of the problem to stay within the bound of available cpu memory  also  in some case the quality of price discovery is poor and it  s difficult to model the price curve independently  we solve the problem by mapping them into more liquid and better behaved core location curve  we have agreed on the following    winston will investigate the it side and determine to what extent we can increase the number of forward price curve that are simulated a basic  core  curve  he will investigate the impact of a larger number of the core curve on the time required to complete the var run    the curve associated with the biggest    position in each commodity should be modeled a core curve  i  e  no mapping into other location   it make sense to monitor the biggest risk separately and avoid aggregating them into le transparent aggregate    the result of an automated clustering  mapping  procedure should be systematically monitored by a human and corrected if they misrepresent the risk of the trading position  this responsibility should be vested with one person  right now the responsibility is dispersed through the organization and this mean in practice that nobody is responsible   research can allocate one person to this task  cooperation of trading and rac will be critical  vince

daily email newsletter for primarily two audience                       internal for employee available via the enron intranet                      external for client  industry at large   also  evaluation of the newsletter    how  will the effectiveness of the newsletter be measured   hit on the website   inquiry from client   don  t have a quick answer but  some goal should be set to subject  new update on ppi model for inflation book  final version dear all  attached is anjam  s reasoning and final version of the uk ppi pllu model  the uk inflation book  s main exposure is to two ppi index  the pllu and the dzcv through year   both are ppi output index with very comparable basket  the only significant difference between the two is the presence of energy in the pllu        the model in use escalates the two index by the same factor  however  with the energy price fluctuation in recent year different model for the two index would reflect better the nature of their driver  anjam concentrated on the pllu index first and he will shortly construct one for the dzcv based on the same methodology  but without the brent crude curve  the new model achieves the two main objective of the ppi curve  it is significantly more robust and stable than the existing one  and it is considerably le sensitive to the input coefficient  this will result in u having more confidence in our monthly p  l a well a le fluctuation  best regard  martina x  anjam ahmad         to  martina angelova  lon  ect  ect cc  subject  new update on ppi model for inflation book dear all  i followed up on the suggestion of happening babe at the conference call a follows     use le data unfortunately  kicking out only  make the overall equation a lot le robust  in fact dramatically so  and so eliminates the possibility of using le data  the model tested wa the rpi  month    ppi pre  empts the move in rpi by about  month  the magnitude of the oscillation is also reduced  this show that if we had more detail in our rpi forward curve  then the ppi model would reflect those peak and hump adequately  conclusion i therefore propose that we use the model that incorporates rpi  rpi  t    and deviation of brent crude from long  term average  the new model is plotted below in burgundy and can be compared to the old ppi which is depicted in blue  please note that all this analysis only applies to pllu  and that a separate study will be needed for the dzcv ppi index  regard  anjam x                        forwarded by anjam ahmad  lon  ect on subject  update on spring conference hello everyone  i wanted to get a message out to each of you to update you on the february  conference plan  the conference promise to provide an exciting opportunity to share the idea of a diverse group of academic and industry professional on a topic that is dear to all our heart  the future of business education in the new economy  i will be sharing update and information with you over the week to come but thought it might be useful to start before the holiday  i am attaching the most recent  description of the program of event  which remains somewhat fluid a we develop it  however  there are some new development that you will find interesting  first  i have arranged for  filming  of the event by our local public tv station and we will be working toward the development of the best product possible out of the session  second  david palumbo  human code   an internet content provider  http    www  humancode  com  index   htm  now owned by sapient  will join u  david is very knowledgable about both educational issue  he served on the faculty of the university of houston for  year before joining human code   he ha some very interesting insight to offer on the future of higher education having now worked from the industry side of the equation   finally  i am currently reading a couple of book that you may find interesting  telecosm and the new barbarian manifesto   i  m sure there are many more interesting source of information that you are each aware of and it would be helpful if we all began sharing our note  finally  let me suggest that each of you begin thinking about the issue  s  that you feel most comfortable commenting upon and phrasing  lead in  question for me  i would like to build a list of such question to circulate among all so that we begin to get a feel for the range of topic we will encounter in the discussion and begin to formulate our individual opinion  i hope that this note find you all martinj  home  html
